name: Puzzles & Ruins
description:
You are Adventure Dude, exploring the ruins of an ancient temple. Solve puzzles to progress through rooms and make it to the end. Each level has at least 1 button, which opens a door that transports you to the next level. Placing a box or stepping on buttons will press them down.  

A = move left
D = move right
Space = jump
Left click = pick up box
Right click = throw box
R = restart level
